learningpod.title: Kaplan Kids (Reading): The word husky has more than one meaning. Choose the sentence in which husky means "r...

p.b: The word husky has more than one meaning.

questionBody.p: Choose the sentence in which husky means "rough or gruff sounding."

simpleChoice.p: I can't pass my jeans down to my younger brother because he's husky and wouldn't fit into them.
Jason's uncle has a gray and white husky named Hans that he uses to pull a sled in the winter.
I must have woken her up because when she answered the phone, her voice was husky.
Gemma's little sister was supposed to clean the corn, but it was still a little husky.
